name.ja: ニャンダフル・ラッシュ

requirement.en: Place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck.

effect.en: Special Summon up to 2 Beast and/or Warrior Type monsters with 200 DEF from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position. This turn, you can only attack with monsters with 200 DEF.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
